IAppTracker

Class with static functions for getting information about installed applications.

 AsyncTask<Void,Void,Void> getPubTargetingStringAsync(Context context, String id, IAppTrackingListener listener)
          Starts new thread that will download the package names associated with the specified organization ID and construct pub targeting string according to the installed applications on the device.

Method Detail

getPubTargetingStringAsync

public AsyncTask<Void,Void,Void> getPubTargetingStringAsync(Context context,
                                                            String id,
                                                            IAppTrackingListener listener)
Starts new thread that will download the package names associated with the specified organization ID and construct pub targeting string according to the installed applications on the device. Results can be received through the IAppTrackingListener interface.

Specified by:
getPubTargetingStringAsync in interface IAppTracker
Parameters:
context - Context current context
id - String organization ID
listener - IAppTrackingListener delegate that will receive a completion callback via IAppTrackingListener.getPubTargetingStringComplete(String)
Returns:
AsyncTask started task
